study_cycle.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this study cycle?
study_cycle.addError: Study cycle has not been added
study_cycle.updateError: Study cycle has not been updated
study_cycle.goodFormat: Correct format: "xxxx/xx-XYZ", where "xxxx" are 4 digits, "xx" are 2 digits, "XYZ" are from 1 to 3 capital letters.
study_cycle.deleteErrorWithReference: Study cycle cannot be deleted because it is still referenced by {{referencedTable}}!

department.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this department?
department.goodCodeFormat: Correct format: a string of 1 to 10 characters, containing only uppercase letters, digits, and forward slashes (/).
department.deleteErrorWithReference: Department cannot be deleted because it is still referenced by {{referencedTable}}!
